quotations.quote: The most important thing I look for in a musician is whether he knows how to listen.
quotations.author: Duke Ellington

quotations.quote: Jazz is played from the heart. You can even live by it. Always love it.
quotations.author: Louis Armstrong

quotations.quote: You not only have to know your own instrument, you must know the others and how to back them up at all times. That’s jazz.
quotations.author: John Coltrane

quotations.quote: My first relationship to any kind of musical situation is as a listener.
quotations.author: Pat Metheny

quotations.quote: When you’re creating your own shit, man, even the sky ain’t the limit.
quotations.author: Miles Davis
